title: [16X][1.6.6] PLAIDCRAFT V.2.4 极富特色的材质l
author: hyl12344321
txt_content:
看到一款很有特色16X的材质
很喜欢树的样子



New tools! I know it's a rush, i'll improve in the future. By the mean time, here you go.

VERSION HISTORY:
v2.4: New tools!
v2.3: Released texture pack with new redwood leaves, fixed HUD, and new crosshair.
v2.0-2.2: Edited textures, including new background, and HUD.
5/23/11: Changed title.
v1.1.1: Edited and published the new glass texture.
v1.1.0: Added full GUI.
v1.0.5-v.1.0.9: Fixed some textures in terrain.png.
v1.0.4-1.0.0: Kept fixing some problems, and finally finished it in 1.0.5.


以上图片模糊特效都是后期编辑
